channel.title: Reflection on The Arboreal Repository
channel.description: Recent content in Reflection on The Arboreal Repository

item.title: "The Arboreal Repository"
item.description: Recent Realizations At the time of writing I’m only a little more than 4 months into my all-consuming focus on coding, but I’m learning a lot quickly. I started my learning acceleration with a one-day, six-hour workshop with the University of Oregon data services department covering basic R in late March. The skills I learned in that workshop served as the foundation for the more powerful data processing that further amplified my primary career.
